definitions.text: a written communication in a second language having the same meaning as the written communication in a first language
the act of changing in form or shape or appearance
examples: a photograph is a translation of a scene onto a two-dimensional surface

definitions.text: (mathematics) a transformation in which the origin of the coordinate system is moved to another position but the direction of each axis remains the same
(genetics) the process whereby genetic information coded in messenger RNA directs the formation of a specific protein at a ribosome in the cytoplasm
rewording something in less technical terminology
